remarks: Lemma for ~ ipassi .  Show the inner product associative law for rational numbers.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ip1i.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
ip1i.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
ip1i.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
ip1i.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
ip1i.9 $e |- U e. CPreHilOLD $.
ipasslem1.b $e |- B e. X $.
ipasslem5 $p |- ( ( C e. QQ /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( C S A ) P B ) = ( C x. ( A P B ) ) ) $.
